episode.title: You Tell Me If It’s a Dongle
episode.rawTitle: 202: ‘You Tell Me If It’s a Dongle’ With Joanna Stern
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Joanna Stern returns to the show. Topics include Apple Watch Series 3, our mutual fear of heights, Velcro, and more.
episode.showNotes:
